code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import ReactDOM from'react-dom/client';import{BrowserRouter}from'react-router-dom';import AppRouter from'./components/AppRouter';import'./fonts/font.css';import{observer}from'mobx-react-lite';import{Context}from'.';import{check}from'./http/userAPI';import{Spinner}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=observer(()=>{const{user}=useContext(Context);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{check().then(data=>{user.setUser(data);user.setIsAuth(true);}).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[]);if(loading)/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spinner,{animation:"grow"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrowserRouter,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppRouter,{})});});export default App;
